TextEng: You got a Third Round Medal! I bet you might even be able to take Claudus! Maybe... <StartAction>(hushed)</Start> if he didn't have an "in" with the healer...
Text: 3라운드 메달이네! 클로더스도 이길 수 있을지도! 아마... <StartAction>(작게)</Start> 그놈이 치료사랑 짜고 치는 게 아니라면...

TextEng: You know, you are pretty tough if you got past Fashi for that Second Round Medal. Maybe you'll actually take Agar. Maybe.
Text: 파시를 이기고 2라운드 메달을 땄으면 꽤 센 거야. 아가르도 이길 수 있을지도. 아마.

TextEng: Okay, so maybe you could get past me, but there's no way you'll beat Fashi. Can't be done. No sir.
Text: 좋아, 나는 이길 수 있을지 몰라, 근데 파시는 절대 못 이겨. 불가능해. 절대.

TextEng: Bah! I got no time for newcomers. You want respect, you step up to the Pit.
Text: 체! 신참한테 쓸 시간 없어. 존경받고 싶으면 피트에 올라.

TextEng: I never thought I'd see it happen. I'm gonna miss this place.
Text: 이런 날이 올 줄은 몰랐네. 이곳이 그리워지겠어.

TextEng: Impressive medal. Claudus might even have to submit to you. That would be good. <StartAction>(hushed)</Start> I suspect he fights with an unfair advantage.
Text: 인상적인 메달이군. 클로더스도 당신에게 무릎 꿇어야 할지도. 좋은 일이야. <StartAction>(작게)</Start> 그가 불공정한 이점으로 싸운다고 생각해.

TextEng: The medal in your possession proves you can best me, but I would prepare for a wholly different battle with Agar.
Text: 그 메달은 나를 이길 수 있다는 증거지만, 아가르와는 완전히 다른 싸움을 준비해야 할 거야.

TextEng: You have surpassed the level that Hrusk was fighting at. Very good. We shall have to see if you can best me.
Text: 흐루스크가 싸우던 수준을 넘어섰군. 아주 좋아. 나를 이길 수 있는지 봐야겠어.

TextEng: Welcome to the Gauntlet. I look forward to seeing you present yourself in the Pit.
Text: 시련장에 온 걸 환영해. 피트에서 실력을 보여주길 기대하지.

TextEng: Me knew it could be done, but me not smart enough to do it. BAH! Me go back to real battles!
Text: 나 할 수 있는 거 알았어, 근데 나 그럴 만큼 똑똑하지 않아. 바! 나 진짜 싸움으로 돌아가!

TextEng: You past Third Round me! You fight good! Bet you try Claudus now! Careful, he not fight fair. Don't know how, but he not fair.
Text: 너 3라운드 통과했어 나! 너 잘 싸워! 이제 클로더스 도전할 거지! 조심해, 걔 공정하게 안 싸워. 어떻게인지 몰라, 근데 공정 안 해.

TextEng: Hah! So you passed that Fashi smallkin? Bah! Me step on him too, one time. You prove you tough to ME next!
Text: 하! 그 파시 꼬맹이 이겼어? 바! 나도 한번 밟은 적 있어. 다음엔 나한테 세다는 거 증명해!

TextEng: Heh, Hrusk too weak. You prove nothing beating him. Maybe Fashi test you, but he small too! Ha! Like watching children!
Text: 헤, 흐루스크 너무 약해. 걔 이겨봤자 증명 안 돼. 파시가 시험해 줄지도, 근데 걔도 작아! 하! 애들 싸움 같아!

TextEng: More meat for Pit? Good! Me tired of what here!
Text: 피트에 고기 더? 좋아! 나 여기 있는 거 지겨워!

TextEng: It's you! It's <FullName>! I love you! I mean, I love your fighting! You took Fashi! Hell, you took Agar!
Text: 당신이야! <FullName>이야! 사랑해! 아, 당신 싸움을 사랑한다고! 파시를 이겼어! 아가르도!

TextEng: Hey there! You are doing pretty good! You got a good medal on you!
Text: 안녕! 잘하고 있네! 좋은 메달 갖고 있어!

TextEng: What? Why would I talk to you? You've got no medals. Feh!
Text: 뭐? 왜 너랑 얘기해? 메달도 없잖아. 체!

TextEng: Sure. See you. Good luck! You're great!
Text: 그래. 또 봐. 행운을 빌어! 대단해!

TextEng: That's right, goodbye. As if I've got time for no-medals like you. Beat it.
Text: 그래, 잘 가. 너처럼 메달도 없는 놈한테 쓸 시간이 있겠어. 꺼져.

TextEng: A newcomer wants to know about the fighters? HA! Like it matters! You'd have to beat the mighty Hrusk and his pet before you're even ranked!
Text: 신참이 전사들에 대해 알고 싶어? 하! 중요하기나 해! 랭크에 들려면 먼저 위대한 흐루스크와 그의 펫을 이겨야 해!

TextEng: Hrusk has that flaming axe, you know? Burn the hair right off you, it would. Even the short stuff!
Text: 흐루스크는 불타는 도끼를 갖고 있어, 알아? 털을 싹 태워버릴 거야. 짧은 것까지도!

TextEng: Go away. I'm done talking to your worthless butt.
Text: 저리 가. 너 같은 쓸모없는 놈하고는 대화 끝이야.

TextEng: I can't believe I'm talking to you. I mean, sure, maybe you used to be a no-medals, but look at you now! WOW!
Text: 너랑 얘기하다니 믿을 수 없어. 그러니까, 물론 예전엔 메달 없었겠지만, 지금 좀 봐! 와!

TextEng: Thanks! <He/She> said thanks! To me! Everyone see that?! Damn right!
Text: 고맙다고! <He/She>가 고맙다고 했어! 나한테! 다들 봤어?! 당연하지!

TextEng: I can't believe it! <CUSTOM710> is just the best! The BEST! That was great!
Text: 믿을 수 없어! <CUSTOM710>은 최고야! 최고! 대단했어!

TextEng: Hmph... wins a few medals and gets all tight... but WOW, that <FullName> can fight! Did you see <him/her> brush me off? ME!
Text: 흥... 메달 몇 개 따고 잘난 척하네... 근데 와, 그 <FullName> 진짜 잘 싸워! <him/her>가 날 무시하는 거 봤어? 나를!

TextEng: Claudus? He's just great! It's like... I don't know! It's like he's almost invulnerable! Some people complain that he's so good, but they just can't compete.
Text: 클로더스? 그냥 대단해! 뭐랄까... 모르겠어! 거의 무적인 것 같아! 어떤 사람들은 그가 너무 잘한다고 불평하지만, 그냥 경쟁이 안 되는 거야.

TextEng: I mean, everything is fair, right? And he doesn't use any magic weapons or anything. Just anmial companions like everyone else. He just seems like a super fighter!
Text: 모든 게 공정하잖아, 그치? 마법 무기 같은 거 안 써. 다른 사람들처럼 그냥 동물 동료만. 그냥 최강의 싸움꾼처럼 보여!

TextEng: Agar is the Third Round Medal fight. He's real tough. He's got a pet, like everyone else, and he's got something nasty too.
Text: 아가르는 3라운드 메달 상대야. 정말 세. 다른 사람들처럼 펫도 있고, 치사한 것도 갖고 있어.

TextEng: Fashi is the Second Round Medal fight. He looks small but boy, he can sure take it. It's amazing, it is.
Text: 파시는 2라운드 메달 상대야. 작아 보이지만 야, 진짜 잘 버텨. 놀랍다니까.

TextEng: Oh, sure. I mean, each guy has a specialty and a pet, but that's all known before a fight begins, if you ask around.
Text: 아, 물론. 그러니까, 각자 특기와 펫이 있는데, 물어보면 싸움 전에 다 알 수 있어.

TextEng: Except for Claudus. He's got no special thing, and his pets are normal like everyone elses, but he seems super-tough anyway. He's just that good.
Text: 클로더스 빼고. 특별한 게 없고 펫도 다른 사람들처럼 평범한데, 어쨌든 엄청 세 보여. 그냥 그렇게 잘해.

TextEng: His weapon poisons. People complained at first, but they got used to it. He's just tough anyway, so he's proved his worth.
Text: 그의 무기는 독을 써. 처음엔 불평했지만 익숙해졌어. 어쨌든 세니까 실력을 증명한 거야.

TextEng: You just can't cut him or poke him. He's so focussed. He bruises though. I noticed that. He's not invulnerable.
Text: 그를 베거나 찌를 수가 없어. 너무 집중해. 멍은 들더라. 그건 봤어. 무적은 아니야.

TextEng: Don't worry about that. You won't get to him. The others are plenty tough, but Claudus is just plain scary.
Text: 그건 걱정 마. 거기까지 못 갈 테니. 다른 놈들도 충분히 센데, 클로더스는 그냥 무섭거든.

TextEng: Don't bother bein' pleasant. Just gimme the secret handshake and you're in, all right?
Text: 친절하게 굴 필요 없어. 비밀 악수만 하면 들어갈 수 있어, 알겠지?

TextEng: Guess you're one of them Bloodsailors, all right. Go on in and find Seldana. She'll give you the dirt on the Gaoler's plans.
Text: 핏빛 항해자 맞구만. 들어가서 셀다나를 찾아. 그녀가 간수장 계획의 내막을 알려줄 거야.
